channel.title: Today Show on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Today Show on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sheinelle Jones Returns to NBC’s ‘Today’ Show, Opens Up About Husband’s Death: “I’m Fighting for My Joy”
item.description: After taking a leave of absence, the co-host of the broadcast morning show’s third hour, spoke with co-anchor Savannah Guthrie about losing her husband from a rare form of brain cancer.

item.title: Sheinelle Jones Returns to NBC’s ‘Today’ Show, Opens Up About Husband’s Death: “I’m Fighting for My Joy”
item.description: After taking a leave of absence, the co-host of the broadcast morning show’s third hour, spoke with co-anchor Savannah Guthrie about losing her husband from a rare form of brain cancer.

item.title: Sheinelle Jones Sets Return to NBC’s ‘Today’ Show
item.description: Jones’ husband, Uche Ojeh, had passed away in May after battling a rare form of brain cancer.
